de.unlixx.runpng.util

Class PivotSorter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unlixx.runpng.util.PivotSorter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The class type to sort.

    public class PivotSorter<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Stack friendly implementation of a pivot sort algorithm. Stack friendly means that it works without recursions. This is a sort in-place.
